# UIView.KeyframeAnimationOptions

**Structure**

Options for configuring keyframe-based animations.

## Declaration

```swift
struct KeyframeAnimationOptions
```

## Overview

Use these options with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/animateKeyframes(withDuration:delay:options:animations:completion:)] method.

## Constants

- **layoutSubviews**: The option to lay out subviews at commit time so that they’re animated along with their parent.
- **allowUserInteraction**: The option that allows a person to interact with views while they’re being animated.
- **beginFromCurrentState**: The option to start an animation from the current setting associated with an already in-flight animation.
- **repeat**: The option to repeat an animation indefinitely.
- **autoreverse**: The option to run an animation backwards and forwards.
- **overrideInheritedDuration**: The option to force an animation to use the original duration value specified when the animation was submitted.
- **overrideInheritedOptions**: The option to not inherit the animation type or any options.
- **calculationModeLinear**: The option to use a simple linear calculation when interpolating between keyframe values.
- **calculationModeDiscrete**: The option to not interpolate between keyframe values, but rather to jump directly to each new keyframe value.
- **calculationModePaced**: The option to compute intermediate keyframe values using a simple pacing algorithm.
- **calculationModeCubic**: The option to compute intermediate frames using a default Catmull-Rom spline that passes through the keyframe values.
- **calculationModeCubicPaced**: The option to compute intermediate frames using the cubic scheme while ignoring the timing properties of the animation.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates keyframe animation options with the specified raw value.

## Constants

- **UIView.AnimationCurve**: Specifies the supported animation curves.
- **UIView.AnimationOptions**: Options for animating views using block objects.
- **UIView.AnimationTransition**: Animation transition options for use in an animation block object.
- **UIView.SystemAnimation**: Option to remove the views from the hierarchy when animation is complete.
- **NSLayoutConstraint.Axis**: Keys that specify a horizontal or vertical layout constraint between objects.
- **UIView.TintAdjustmentMode**: The tint adjustment mode for the view.
- **layoutFittingCompressedSize**: The option to use the smallest possible size.
- **layoutFittingExpandedSize**: The option to use the largest possible size.
- **noIntrinsicMetric**: The absence of an intrinsic metric for a given numeric view property.
- **UIView.AutoresizingMask**: Options for automatic view resizing.
- **UISemanticContentAttribute**: A semantic description of the view’s contents, used to determine whether the view should be flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
